Text: Hey brego45, your uploads are great, but it would be good if you could indicate whether the content is softcore or hardcore in the title or description.  I have downloaded some of your movies to find that the content is heavily censored or has very little hardcore content....
Thank you for the up. But I couldn't understand what's "Tavan Arasi" (means Attic) got to do with a Joe D'amato movie. Is it Turkish subbed or what?
